title: 3BR, 2BA: Spacious, Urban Living, near Financial District
posting_body: Experience the best of urban life in San Francisco here.
Newly remodeled apartment in an amazing location near SF Downtown and one block to the Financial District.
Enjoy 3 bedrooms, 2 full bathrooms, lots of space and plenty of natural sunlight.
Enjoy a view of the SF skyline from the outdoor patio
This neighborhood has plenty of great restaurants, bars, lounges, sights and sounds all around!
Overview of the accommodations:
- Large windows, hardwood floors and high ceilings throughout
- Each of the 3 bedroom have ample closet space.
- Kitchen is equipped with gas stove and all major appliances.
- 2 Full bathrooms with standing showers
- In-unit washer and dryer laundry
Street parking only, nearby parking garages are very expensive.
No smoking in apartment or building.
No elevator in building.
No pets, no smokers please.
TERMS: Must move in within 30 days.
12 month term then month to month.
Tenant pays PG&E and water (water is $35/person)
MOVE-IN FEES:
First month rent (will pro-rate for partial month), Last month rent deposit, and $2000 security deposit.
If interested, please reply with your desired move-in date and full contact info.
Otherwise, your email will be disregarded.
